name: Sparkle Knowledge Yard
description: Sparkle Academy (Sparkle Knowledge Yard) is a leading language training and test preparation institute in Chennai, offering expert coaching for IELTS, OET, PTE, TOEFL, GRE, GMAT, and foreign languages including German, French, Spanish, and Japanese.
